Organics/ Wolfblade/ Megatron Revived/ Hellplague:

Back in the mess ahll of the Maximal Base, Organics and Wolfblade 
recieve Kup's call to arms.

"Should we go?" Wolfblade asked, mentally exhausted.  "What if we DO 
lose the cannon, we'd have to launch the sphere."

Organics shook her head and stood from her seat.
"No.  We must go and fight.  Thy may have sen Malice, we might have a 
chance to get him back."

Wolfblade thought about it, about him.  She thought long and hard, 
and then she stood up.
"Let's go get him." 

Both femmes ran out of the base, and Organics picked Wolfblade up and 
carried herall the way to the Cannon site.

Deep within the base, another answered the call.  Though he was not 
an Autobot, he still had reasons to fight.  The great black and white 
bot got up, walked through the dark corridors,and exited the now 
nearly empty base.  He detected where eveyone was headed, and he too, 
took flight.  Megatron Revived transformed into his gunship form and 
followed, there fighting to be done and he wanted to be in the middle 
of it.


Hellplague waited for the rest of her strike force to achieve the 
same altitude as he, and then they all took off for the cannon.
"For the glory of Unicron!" she cried as the cannon site crept into 
her view.
